original: intros. unfold TraverseRelative in *. destruct Build_TraverseRelative as [traverse_rel]. apply traverse_rel with (f := fun l x => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) (g := fun l x => var (lift k 0 v)) (p := 0) (t := t) (m := 0) (l := 1). intros. destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec (l0 + 0) l). - simpl. rewrite e. unfold subst_idx. destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec x (l0 + 0)). + destruct s0. + reflexivity. - inversion l1.
